description: Defines a custom Polymer element 'paper-tabs' for a tabbed interface, including styles, template, and behavior scripts.

classes.name: paper-tabs
classes.description: Custom Polymer element implementing a tabbed interface with scrolling and selection features.

methods.name: _noinkChanged
methods.description: Updates 'noink' attribute on child 'paper-tab' elements based on the 'noink' property.

methods.name: _setNoinkAttribute
methods.description: Sets 'noink' attribute on a given element.

methods.name: _removeNoinkAttribute
methods.description: Removes 'noink' attribute from a given element.

methods.name: _computeScrollButtonClass
methods.description: Determines CSS class for scroll buttons based on visibility conditions.

methods.name: _computeTabsContentClass
methods.description: Returns CSS class for tabs content container based on 'scrollable' property.

methods.name: _computeSelectionBarClass
methods.description: Returns CSS class for selection bar based on 'noBar' and 'alignBottom' properties.

methods.name: _onResize
methods.description: Handles resize events to adjust tab scrolling and selection.

methods.name: _onIronSelect
methods.description: Handles 'iron-select' event to update tab selection visuals.

methods.name: _onIronDeselect
methods.description: Handles 'iron-deselect' event to update tab selection visuals.

methods.name: _scroll
methods.description: Handles scroll events to scroll tabs horizontally.

methods.name: _down
methods.description: Handles mouse/touch down events for focus management.

methods.name: _affectScroll
methods.description: Adjusts scroll position of tab container.

methods.name: _onLeftScrollButtonDown
methods.description: Starts scrolling left when left scroll button is pressed.

methods.name: _onRightScrollButtonDown
methods.description: Starts scrolling right when right scroll button is pressed.

methods.name: _onScrollButtonUp
methods.description: Stops scrolling when scroll button is released.

methods.name: _scrollToLeft
methods.description: Scrolls tabs to the left by a step.

methods.name: _scrollToRight
methods.description: Scrolls tabs to the right by a step.

methods.name: _tabChanged
methods.description: Updates the position and animation of the selection indicator when tab changes.

methods.name: _scrollToSelectedIfNeeded
methods.description: Scrolls the tab container to ensure the selected tab is visible.

methods.name: _calcPercent
methods.description: Calculates percentage width relative to container.

methods.name: _positionBar
methods.description: Positions and scales the selection bar element.

methods.name: _onBarTransitionEnd
methods.description: Handles end of selection bar transition to animate expansion/contraction.
